title: Most popular product brands on Facebook 2020
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Facebook fans in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
There is a difference of 159.62 between the maximum Platform Facebook and minimum Platform KFC.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Facebook fans in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Platform, and Facebook fans in millions in each Platform on the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Platform Facebook and lowest at Platform KFC.
There is a difference of 159.62 between the maximum Platform Facebook and minimum Platform KFC.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Platform in the x axis and Facebook fans in millions in the y axis.
The maximum Facebook fans in millions 214.62 is found at Platform Facebook and the minimum is found at KFC where Platform is 55.0.
The second highest Facebook fans in millions is appeared to be the Platform Samsung.
The difference of Facebook fans in millions between the highest and lowest Platform is 159.62.
Platform Facebook is higher than any other Platforms with value 214.62, followed by Samsung, and Coca-Cola. Down to Platform KFC with the lowest value 55.0.
The lowest value 55.0 at KFC is almost 2.23 times smaller than the average value 96.24.
Summing up the values of all Platforms, we get total 962.41.
